definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
variant of 晰[xi1]/variant of 皙|晰[xi1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Specifically, the clarity and projection of the altissimo range.
sentences.chinese: 具体地说，可以影响高音区发音的清晰度和穿透力吗？

sentences.english: The enhanced speech signals of the proposed algorithm have better clearness and intelligibility besides higher output SNR.
sentences.chinese: 增强后的语音具有更好的可懂度和清晰度。

sentences.english: The depth it reaches before disappearing gives a measure of water clarity.
sentences.chinese: 它在达到消失的深度之前，可以测量出水的清晰度。

sentences.english: Typical applications include stream processing of high resolution images for deployed airborne surveillance.
sentences.chinese: 其典型应用包括空中监视高清晰度图像的流处理。

sentences.english: To meet the audio conferencing-based language-definition issues.
sentences.chinese: 满足会议功能电声为主的语言清晰度问题。

sentences.english: The performance is broadcast on high-fidelity speakers and high-definition television.
sentences.chinese: 表演在高保真度扬声器和高清晰度电视上播送。

sentences.english: They offer sharpness that zoom lenses cannot touch.
sentences.chinese: 它们提供变焦镜头不能达到的清晰度。

sentences.english: Image enhancement for technical clarity is always permissible.
sentences.chinese: 为了提高技术清晰度而强华形象是允许的。

sentences.english: General low-end lenses of thick poor comfort, clarity than high-grade slightly worse.
sentences.chinese: 一般低档镜片厚舒适性差，清晰度比中高档稍差些。

sentences.english: This type of spectacle was one of the few that did not require a high degree of speech intelligibility for its appreciation by the audience.
sentences.chinese: 这种类型是为数不对语音清晰度要求不高的活动。

sentences.english: Fourth, the resolution limited by the device itself, grainy obvious.
sentences.chinese: 第四，其清晰度受到设备本身限制，颗粒感明显。

sentences.english: It supports high-quality video up to DVD level and above.
sentences.chinese: 图像清晰度高，达到DVD级别以上。

sentences.english: Electronic viewfinders cannot match the clarity of a good optical finder
sentences.chinese: 电子取景器清晰度还无法和光学取景器相比。

sentences.english: It makes me lie down in front of the high-definition screen.
sentences.chinese: 它使我躺卧在高清晰度的荧幕前。

sentences.english: By estimating the speech articulation exactly, the investment can be economized, and the risks can be reduced.
sentences.chinese: 正确的清晰度估算可以节约投资，降低工程风险。

sentences.english: The estimation of speech articulation is one of important connections of architectural acoustics and sound reinforcement system.
sentences.chinese: 语言清晰度估算是建筑声学和扩声系统重要联系之一。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
standard definition (TV or video image quality)
